text:
STUDENT: So my
perspectives about language

have changed significantly
over the course of this class.

I think in awakening
me and making

me acknowledge biases and
perceptions that I had

and trying to recognize that
all languages are equal.

You know, and thinking about
other aspects of my life

where, you know, wanting as
a minority woman of color,

thinking of equality
in that terms

that I never thought to
apply it to language.

I never really considered
how important language

You know, we learned a lot
about how, in this class,

there are political, social,
and economic implications.

And so, I feel like this class
has changed my perspective

in making me aware
of those things

and realizing that language
is important and that, yeah,
